name: 2018 3rd International Conference on Communication and Information Systems (ICCIS 2018)--Ei Compendex and Scopus
content: \*\*Publication: After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published in the ICCIS 2018 conference Proceedings, and which will be indexed Ei Compendex and Scopus. \*\*History: ICCIS 2017 | November 7-9 | Wuhan, China: The accepted papers in ICCIS 2017 has already been published in ACM conference proceeding (ISBN: 978-1-4503-4809-6) and included in ACM digital library. ICCIS 2016 | December 16-18 | Bangkok, Thailand: ICCIS 2016 Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-4791-4) has been online in ACM digital library and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. \*\*Submission Methods: 1\. Full Paper(publication and oral presentation) 2\. Abstract(oral presentation only) Please submit your paper or abstract via Electronic Submission System (.pdf) http://www.easychair.org/conferences/?conf=iccis2018
